drivers.name: foo2slx
drivers.comments:
This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

This is a driver developed for the Lexmark C500.

PPD files (and the Foomatic XML files to generate them) come with the driver, therefore we do not supply PPDs here on the OpenPrinting site.

notes:
The Lexmark C500 is a networked color laser printer with a 2007 street price of $300 USD. This printer is supported by the foo2slx open software printer driver.

Consumables/Refills: Toner Black (5000 prints) - $90 Toner Yellow (3000 prints) - $90 Toner Magenta (3000 prints) - $90 Toner Cyan (3000 prints) - $90 Photodeveloper Cartridge (120000 prints) - $205 Part numbers: C500H2KG, C500H2YG, C500H2MG, C500H2CG, C500X26G
